evidence.claim: Astron EHS utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure and data storage solutions.
The company integrates with healthcare systems through a variety of HL7 standards for data exchange.
Astron EHS employs X12 transaction sets for billing and claims processing in compliance with HIPAA.
Their platform features RESTful API capabilities for integration with EHR systems.

icp.icp_reason: Company utilizes X12 standards for claims and remittance, indicating fit for API-first data exchange.
